answers.answer: I would bet that most of this is anxiety related.  Your cardiac workup is relatively normal.  During the time when you wore the Holter, did you feel any palpitations?  If so, then I definitely wouldn't do any further workup.  If you didn't experience any during that period I would suggest a 48 holter or an event monitor to be absolutely certain because there weren't that many PAC's on the holter.
